subject: Why isn't TestResult serializable?
msgSnippet: Hi, I would like to define a method on an EJB that returns a junit.framework.TestResult , but TestResult is not serializable. I could write a data object that
messageBody:
Hi,
I would like to define a method on an EJB that returns a
junit.framework.TestResult , but TestResult is not serializable. I could
write a data object that implements Serializable and populate it with the
data from TestResult, but I am curious why TestResult was not made
serializable from the start.
Any other ideas or suggestions?
Thanks, Leo
